name: Track Racer
description:
Game Description: 

A 3D racing game created using Unreal Engine for a university project. The player will control a race car and will compete against 3 AI-controlled cars. 

The track was created in Blender.

There will be track hazards to avoid, including barriers around the track to prevent corner cutting and low grip areas surrounding the track. The player will need to pass the start/finish line to start each new lap, and will also need to pass through the two checkpoints set around the track for each lap, to prevent the player from cheating by crossing the start/finish line repeatedly without driving around the whole track. 

Game Controls:

Accelerate W/Up 

Turn Left A/Left 

Turn Right D/Right 

Brake SpaceBar 

Handbrake S/Down
